SEARCH
Package model

Class Bill

Object
Bill
public class Bill extends Object
The Bill class represents a bill for a patient's appointment outcome record. It supports calculating total amount and due amount for the appointment outcome record and generating a (terminal) printable bill.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private AppointmentOutcomeRecord
    outcomeRecord
    The appointment outcome record associated with the bill.

    • getDue

      public float getDue()
      Calculates the due amount of the bill. The dispensed medications are excluded from the due amount.
      Returns:
      the due amount of the bill
